Package com.example.rucafe

Class DonutRecViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<DonutRecViewAdapter.ItemsHolder>
      • com.example.rucafe.DonutRecViewAdapter
  • public class DonutRecViewAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<DonutRecViewAdapter.ItemsHolder>
    DonutRecViewAdapter Class is a class that gives the GUI a list of donuts with it's respective properties and the corresponding methods that go with it.
    Author:
    Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain
